vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.8;
son of: Becher (H1071);
brother of: Joash (H3135), Eliezer (H0461I), Elioenai (H0454I), Omri (H6018H), Jeremoth (H3406H), Abijah (H0029K), Anathoth (H6068H) and Alemeth (H5964H)
§ Zemira = "song"
one of the sons of Becher, the son of Benjamin
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Béquer; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細米拉 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "歌"
一名便雅憫人 (代上 7:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
细米拉 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "歌"
一名便雅悯人 (代上 7:8)
